title: 2022 Week 3 Preview: Game Picks and Locks of the Week
itunes:title: 2022 Week 3 Preview: Game Picks and Locks of the Week
description:
A room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, and Gregg Rosenthal get you ready for Week 3 in the NFL. To start, the guys looks at this week's primetime games with Sunday night's matchup between the 49ers and Broncos in Denver (3:22) and the Cowboys visiting the Giants on Monday night (10:36). Then, the guys start drafting this week's games (17:17) starting with a big AFC East matchup between two unbeaten teams in the Bills and Dolphins. After the break, the guys tell you if Kirk Cousins is set for a rebound game against the Lions (26:56) and then talk about what may be the last time we see Aaron Rodgers and Tom Brady in a game together (34:47). Everyone picks a lock of the week, and the guys tell you how the Jets could pull the plug on the Bengals' season in Week 3 (59:30).

Note: timecodes approximate.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
